Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that allows two students to communicate over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can illustrate how the device uses sound to send information between the students.
The student can depict the students at a certain distance apart, showing the length of the string between them.
The student can include the materials used to create the string telephone in their drawing (like cups or cans and string).
The student can show the string tight enough to allow sound to travel effectively.
The student can illustrate an example of how the string telephone helps the students communicate over long distances.
